name: Disaster Readiness in Partnership with Cal OES
description: It takes a community to recover from a natural disaster. That’s Catholic Charities is proud to support community-led efforts to prepare for one. Whether you’re looking to take action for your household, inspire others, or serve your community, we will help you in achieving your disaster-readiness goals. We have Disaster Preparedness Playbook, conduct Disaster Ready Workshops, coordinate Donation Drives, etc.
